title: Please Help
body: Every time I try logging into riot games support it automatically logs me out and brings me to an error page, i tried clearing my history but it keeps doing it.

replies.body:
Hmmm.. It's been a while since I've heard of this issue. You *may* be able to resolve this if you [**clear your entire browser's cache**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies), rather than just the history. If that still doesn't work, I'd recommend trying a different browser entirely, since this may be caused by a specific browser addon or configuration you've made.

Let me know if this worked for you.
